mapper.select: /* login.geUsertInfo */ SELECT USR.auth_cd ,USR.user_id ,USR.iam_yn ,USR.status_cd ,USR.name ,USR.jikgub_cd ,USR.jikgub_nm ,USR.dept ,USR.tdept_nm ,USR.email ,USR.emp_no AS empNo ,USR.gis_auth ,USR.del_yn AS delYn ,USR.user_pw AS userPw FROM kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.del_yn = 'N' AND USR.user_id = #{user_id} AND USR.iam_yn = #{iam_yn}

/* login.geUsertInfoFromIAm */ SELECT USR.isextra ,USR.userid AS user_id ,USR.resno ,USR.name ,USR.cname ,USR.ename ,USR.sexcd ,USR.birthdt ,USR.lunaryn ,USR.curzipcd ,USR.curzipaddr ,USR.curaddr ,USR.hometel ,USR.officetel ,USR.admintel ,USR.handphone ,USR.email ,USR.officefax ,USR.toporgcd ,USR.dept ,USR.dept_mogahacd AS deptMogahacd ,USR.rdept_mogahacd AS rdeptMogahacd ,USR.fdeptnm ,USR.tdeptnm AS tdept_nm ,USR.ldeptnm ,USR.sdeptnm ,USR.buildid ,USR.gwip ,USR.jikrankcd ,USR.jikrankseq ,USR.jikgubcd AS jikgub_cd ,USR.jikgubnm AS jikgub_nm ,USR.statuscd AS status_cd ,USR.empNo FROM AO_IAM.VAOI_PPSS_USER_MAP_BD USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.userid = #{user_id}

/* login.getUserAuthInfo */ SELECT auth.auth_cd ,auth.admin_yn FROM kcgbd.t_auth auth ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND auth.auth_cd = USR.auth_cd AND USR.user_id = #{user_id} AND USR.iam_yn = #{iam_yn}

/* login.getAuthMenuList */ SELECT mnu.menu_nm ,mnu.menu_url ,amm.use_yn ,amm.c_yn ,amm.r_yn ,amm.u_yn ,amm.d_yn FROM kcgbd.t_auth_menu_mapping amm ,kcgbd.t_menu mnu WHERE 1=1 AND amm.menu_url = mnu.menu_url AND amm.auth_cd = #{auth_cd}
/* login.getAuthMenuList_superadmin */ SELECT mnu.menu_nm ,mnu.menu_url ,'Y' use_yn ,'Y' c_yn ,'Y' r_yn ,'Y' u_yn ,'Y' d_yn FROM kcgbd.t_menu mnu WHERE 1=1
/* login.getAuthMenuList_allportal */ SELECT mnu.menu_nm ,mnu.menu_url ,'Y' use_yn ,'Y' c_yn ,'Y' r_yn ,'Y' u_yn ,'Y' d_yn FROM kcgbd.t_menu mnu WHERE 1=1 AND mnu.admin_yn = 'N'
/* login.TbCodemstEntity */ select code_no as codeNo, code_nm as codeNm from kcgbd.tb_codemst where code_cl = '141'
